notes: Registry of Cerebras rate limits consumed by lib.py. Update entries when quotas change.

gpt-oss-120b.notes: Production quota (tokens cadence noted in docs); default delay stays low to use full throughput.

zai-glm-4.7.notes: Preview limits for zai-glm-4.7; keep delay low but prevent bursts that exceed per-minute caps.

zai-glm-4.6.notes: Preview limits; infer narrower delay from per-minute quota to stay within the upper bound.

llama3.1-8b.notes: Production quota with higher throughput; delay targets the minute limit.

llama-3.3-70b.notes: Higher-capacity production model; we focus on staying inside the minute window.

qwen-3-235b-a22b-instruct-2507.notes: Preview instruct-tuned large model; matches the broader preview caps.

qwen-3-32b.notes: Production preview; treat as production-class throughput with the same limits as 235b.
